text: Tomara hata tomara kasalatita thoraa, e'ito trautimukta arasthata subhraojjbala hai ola'i ahiba. Lagate bhaya dura karaara babe tomara duhata nijara phale cepi dharaa. Eteke e'i duta haiche tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa diya pramana, phira'a'una arau tara paraisadabargara babe. Niscaya sihamta phachikba sampradaya
